header.tagline: Senior Supply Chain Leader – Global Operations & Strategic Planning

summary: Accomplished supply chain leader in Pharma & FMCG with over 15 years of experience, driving $75M+ cost savings with strategic transformations.

bullets.text: Designed and executed the regional restructuring process for LETIS, aligning operations with strategic regional objectives to enhance competitive positioning, resulting in a 20% increase in operational efficiency.
Implemented a comprehensive procurement redesign for SGS tailored to specific business unit needs, achieving a significant 25% reduction in procurement costs in the first year.
Oversaw operations across Argentina, Paraguay, Uruguay, Chile, and Bolivia, driving $12.5M productivity gains at regional distribution centers through the 'Open+' methodology.
Spearheaded the integration of customer collaboration teams with commercial activities, significantly enhancing customer service responsiveness.
Drove the reduction of Finished Product Days of Inventory (FP DoI) from 45 to 15 days, realizing a P&L impact of $75M.
Generated $58.5M in productivity improvements through focused process optimization initiatives.
Led organizational shift from S&OP to IBP methodology with a comprehensive cultural transformation strategy.
Nationalized 75% of imported materials amid SIRAs regulations, ensuring continued production and market supply.
Managed Supply & Demand Planning, Material Management, ComEx, and Order to Cash teams, optimizing operations at two production plants.
Aligned production plans with LATAM demand forecasts, ensuring timely release of Raw Materials and Finished Products for optimal customer supply.
Orchestrated on-site 4PL replacement, contributing to significant operational efficiencies and cost savings.
Integrated Order to Cash and ComEx departments, achieving a streamlined process flow and improved cash cycle management.
Facilitated a $2.7M reduction in raw materials, improving cash flow during the pandemic.
Expanded company presence into the food industry for temperature-controlled shipments, increasing shipment volume by 32% via tier 2 customers.
Secured two tier 1 pharma tenders, overseeing operational activities and contributing to significant revenue growth.
Designed and led the implementation of LATAM planning HUB and SAP APO, transitioning from Manugistics to enhance planning accuracy.
Achieved a 98% CSL at a regional level by optimizing supply chain processes and reducing stock levels.
Reduced purchasing MOQ, saving $1089.7K, and cut stock days from 80 to 65, releasing $5.4M.
Decreased safety stock days by 15 at a regional level, releasing $4.5M, and reduced working capital from $76.9M to $57.7M.
Coordinated the resourceful transference of a NY production plant, maintaining market availability.

experience.title: Regional Operations Responsible CARICAM, EC, PE, UR, BO

bullets.text: Implemented a Drop Shipment process for materials, achieving a 35% savings on the area's budget.
Executed 3M&6M purchasing forecasts with distributors, enhancing supply chain visibility.
